long_description: The Eureka Copper Canyon 8 is a spacious and sturdy cabin-style tent. This recreational camping tent allows the whole gang to hang out, stretch out and sleep well. 9-pole cabin-style tent provides generous living space; vertical walls are ideal for potential cot use. Removable divider curtain creates 2 rooms for privacy or kids, or rolls back to reveal 1 large room. Freestanding, combination steel/fiberglass frame with clips, pole sleeves and ring-and-pin assembly makes setup easy. Full mesh roof allows circulation of air and reduces condensation. 2 large D-style opposing doors with half windows allow easy entry and exit. Windows on each side and in rear panel offer visibility and ventilation. Windows stash in their own pockets which eliminates hassling with fabric ties or loops/toggles. 2 gear lofts plus high stash pockets store small, personal gear. Stormshield(R) polyester fly provides a durable, longlasting and sag-free cover; weatherproof door and window panels seal out the elements and allow ventilation control. Bring electrical power cord inside tent through dedicated, zippered port. Guylines stow out of the way on Copper Canyon 8 rainfly during setup/takedown. Includes stuff sacks, stakes and guyline.
short_description: The Eureka Copper Canyon 8 is a spacious and sturdy cabin-style tent. This recreational camping tent allows the whole gang to hang out, stretch out and sleep well.
